Project Description
A .NET animation library that supports both declarative and imperative animations, capable of creating from simple animation to entire games.


This library was first presented in codeproject http://www.codeproject.com/Articles/634353/Fluent-and-Imperative-Animations and it is actually the best place to understand its usage.

It is still missing an article, but you can see a Shoot em Up game made with this library for Silverlight 5 at http://paulozemek.azurewebsites.net/ShootEmUpTestPage.2013_10_10.html and for WPF at http://paulozemek.azurewebsites.net/ShootEmUp_WpfRelease.2013_10_10.zip
